name: Baby Squid Game
description:
Baby Squid Game is a fully decentralized, hyper-deflationary layer 2 Meme Token hosted on the Binance Smart Chain. BSG is one of the early original Squid Game Tokens, which has received notoriety and success with major listings, long-term sustainability, and strong performance.

BSG has an ambitious mission to become the first BSC Token to perform long-term consistent and strong growth with our progressive hyper-deflationary protocol. Our Token supply will experience decreases throughout time as BSG Tokens are consistently burned with our 3% Deflationary Burn Transaction Tax Protocol, which tightens the total supply.

It has now been 2 years since BSG has launched and so far over 72% of the total/max supply has been burned!
